item.title: Congressional Research Service
item.description: Links RICO: A Brief Sketch (crsreports.congress.gov) (Source: Congressional Research Service) Click on this link to visualize the original document: rico_a_brief_sketch_96-950.pdf Money Laundering: An Overview of 18 U.S.C. § 1956 and Related Federal Criminal Law (Source: Congressional Research Service) Click on this link to visualize the original document: money_laundering_overview_18_usc_1956_RL33315.pdf Can a Foreign Employee of a Foreign Company be Federally Prosecuted for Foreign Bribery?
